title: october 12: the original sausage party (with Dayglow)
description:
Oh Oktoberfest… A time where you have the excuse to drink lots of beer, eat good food, and for men to wear lederhosen. But how did this celebration in Europe gain its roots? On this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares the origin Oktoberfest, which oddly enough started as a celebration of marriage. Along with this, Maia tells of another type of festival which holds as a memorable moment for fellow artist Dayglow - the time when Dayglow performed his first festival at Austin City Limits! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
